      • setOptionOnEscape

        void setOptionOnEscape(java.lang.String text,
                       java.lang.Object optionId)
        optionSelected() with these parameters will be called when the player presses "escape" while in the dialog, as the dialog is being dismissed. Can be set to null to have the escape key do nothing.
        Parameters:
        text -
        optionId -
